TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignTimeData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides helper methods that can be used by control designers to generate sample data for data-bound properties at design time. This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.DataTable CreateDummyDataBoundDataTable ();
.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.DataTable CreateDummyDataBoundDataTable() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a object that contains three columns with names indicating that the columns are connected to a data source.
Docs.returns: A new object with three columns and no data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The table is not actually bound to a data source. Each column name simply indicates that it is a data-bound column. The column data types are string, integer, and string. The calling designer component must add rows and data to the resulting table.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.DataTable CreateDummyDataTable ();
.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.DataTable CreateDummyDataTable() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a object that contains three columns with names that indicate that the columns contain sample data.
Docs.returns: A new with three columns. These columns can contain data of type string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The column data types are all string. The calling designer component can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method to add rows of data to the resulting table.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.DataTable CreateSampleDataTable (System.Collections.IEnumerable referenceData);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.DataTable CreateSampleDataTable(class System.Collections.IEnumerable referenceData) cil managed

Docs.param: A data source with the desired schema to use as the format for the sample object.
Docs.summary: Creates a sample object with the same schema as the provided data.
Docs.returns: A object that contains columns with the same names and data types as the provided .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The data types that can be created are the primitive types, such as number, string, and date types. Any other types are replaced by columns of type `String`. The calling designer component can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method to add rows of data to the resulting table.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Data.DataTable CreateSampleDataTable (System.Collections.IEnumerable referenceData, bool useDataBoundData);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Data.DataTable CreateSampleDataTable(class System.Collections.IEnumerable referenceData, bool useDataBoundData) cil managed

Docs.param: If , the column names indicate that they contain bound data.
Docs.summary: Creates a object with the same schema as the provided data and optionally containing column names indicating that the data is bound data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The data types that can be created are the primitive types, such as number, string, and date types. Any other types are replaced by columns of type `String`. The calling designer component can use <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> to add rows of data to the resulting table.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly EventHandler DataBindingHandler;
.field public static initonly class System.EventHandler DataBindingHandler

Docs.summary: Gets an event handler for data binding.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetDataFields (System.Collections.IEnumerable dataSource);
.method public static hidebysig class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetDataFields(class System.Collections.IEnumerable dataSource) cil managed

Docs.param: The data source from which to retrieve the data fields.
Docs.summary: Gets a collection of property descriptors for the data fields of the specified data source.
Docs.returns: A object that describes the data fields of the specified data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDataMember (System.ComponentModel.IListSource dataSource, string dataMember);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDataMember(class System.ComponentModel.IListSource dataSource, string dataMember) cil managed

Docs.param: An that contains the data in which to find the member.
The name of the data member to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Gets the specified data member from the specified data source.
Docs.returns: An object implementing <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> containing the specified data member from the specified data source, if it exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method searches the specified data source for the specified data member. If `dataMember` is `null`, the first data member in the specified data source is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string[] GetDataMembers (object dataSource);
.method public static hidebysig string[] GetDataMembers(object dataSource) cil managed

Docs.param: The data source from which to retrieve the names of the members.
Docs.summary: Gets the names of the data members in the specified data source.
Docs.returns: An array of type that contains the names of the data members in the specified data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeDataSource (System.Data.DataTable dataTable, int minimumRows);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetDesignTimeDataSource(class System.Data.DataTable dataTable, int32 minimumRows) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to which the sample rows are added.
The minimum number of rows to add.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified number of sample rows to the specified data table.
Docs.returns: An object implementing <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> containing sample data for use at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetSelectedDataSource (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, string dataSource);
.method public static hidebysig object GetSelectedDataSource(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, string dataSource) cil managed

Docs.param: The object that contains the data source.
The name of the data source to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Gets a data source selected by name in the design host, represented by the specified component's site property and identified by the specified data source name.
Docs.returns: An object implementing either or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> representing the selected data source, or if the data source or the designer host could not be accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.IEnumerable GetSelectedDataSource (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, string dataSource, string dataMember);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetSelectedDataSource(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, string dataSource, string dataMember) cil managed

Docs.param: The object implementing that contains the data sourced property.
Docs.summary: Gets a data source selected by name in the design host, represented by the specified component's site property and identified by the specified data-source name and member name.
Docs.returns: An object implementing <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> containing the data member, or if the data source, member, or component's site could not be accessed.
